overview: Dr Simon Harding is Chairman of the Chronos Consulting Group of companies. Active in 70 countries with over 6000 contractors in recruitment, oil, gas, nuclear, alternative energy, IT and Telecoms sectors. Simon successfully divested 4 businesses to the MPS group (NYSE:MPS) now part of Adecco in 2006 and has jvs with several Fortune 1000 and listed recruiters.
